messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What are some of the monsters and creatures that appear in the text?
go, Moon-Beasts, Serpent People, Insects from Shaggai, Shoggoths, Star Vampires, and Beings from Xicotl.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the context of the kidnapping and ransom in the text?
The daughter of a local industrialist has been kidnapped, and the ransom payoff ended in a gunfight on the edge of the Green Mountain National Forest.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main plot of the story?
The investigators must rescue the girl, hunt the criminals down, and bring them to justice.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where does the story take place?
The Green Mountain National Forest.
You are a helpful assistant.
When did the kidnappers escape the scene?
The kidnappers have escaped the scene with both the girl and the ransom money, and fled back into the forest.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the setting for the adventure 'Amidst the Ancient Trees'?
Amidst the Ancient Trees takes place in the summer of 1925 in Southwest Vermont, though Keepers may relocate the adventure’s setting and change the period to suit their gaming group.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the goal of the investigators in the adventure?
The investigators must rescue the girl, hunt the criminals down, and bring them to justice.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where are the investigators based when they sign up for the search party?
The investigators are in Bennington, Vermont
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main focus of this scenario?
This scenario emphasizes action over investigation.
You are a helpful assistant.
What skills will be most useful for the investigators?
The most useful skills will be Tracking, Spot Hidden, Listen, Stealth, Fighting, and Firearms.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can female characters join the search posse?
There is no reason why female characters cannot join the search posse.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should the Keeper do if creating characters solely for this scenario?
The Keeper may wish to make the players aware of this beforehand if creating characters solely for this scenario, to prevent selecting skill sets that will see little use.
You are a helpful assistant.
What skills are the most useful for the players?
Tracking, Spot Hidden, Listen, Stealth, Fighting, and Firearms.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can female characters join the search posse?
There is no reason why female characters cannot do so.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where can the Keeper find information about Gla'aki and its servants?
Chapter 14: Monsters, Beasts and Alien Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Great Old One known as?
Gla'aki
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the Great Old One that came to Earth?
Gla'aki
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the original form of Gla'aki?
a crystal prison
You are a helpful assistant.
Where did the meteor and crystal prison land after breaking apart?
across the globe
You are a helpful assistant.
What keeps Gla'aki confined to Earth?
the power of the crystal prison
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Gla'aki confined to?
the crystal prison
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the power within the shards when Gla'aki destroys them?
the weaker the prison becomes
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of Gla'aki's actions?
to escape the prison and travel unrestrained
You are a helpful assistant.
What effect does Gla'aki's Dream Call have on the inhabitants of the surrounding lands?
to convert them into undead servants
You are a helpful assistant.
When was Joseph Turner and his gang conscripted into the Union Army?
You are a helpful assistant.
Where did Turner and his gang flee after deserting the Union Army?
Into what would later become the Green Mountain National Forest
You are a helpful assistant.
Where did Turner and his gang encounter something far more remarkable?
North of the small village of Somerset, Vermont
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the ultimate goal of Gla'aki mentioned in the text?
To finally escape the prison and travel unrestrained once more
